sourcesContent:
export default [
  {
    created: '2016-03-07T05:24:40.340Z',
    details: 'Right now we only support single backticks. Would be nice to do triple as well... Consider supporting more or all of markdown but I\'m not sure that\'s the right direction.',
    title: 'Support triple backtick codeblocks',
    votes: 17,
  },
  {
    created: '2016-03-31T14:31:15.222Z',
    details: 'Maybe using some tool that allows the community to work on the translations.',
    title: 'Translate into different languages',
    votes: 46,
  },
  {
    created: '2016-04-05T16:47:55.487Z',
    details: 'Allow video attachments because sometimes a single photo isn\'t enough to explain the issue.',
    title: 'Video attachments',
    votes: 20,
  },
  {
    created: '2016-04-30T19:10:37.058Z',
    details: 'When realising that their post actually doesn\'t make much sense, the only option users have to get rid of it is deleting the post. This is not optimal, since then other users might be submitting that again even though it was posted before!\n' +
      '\n' +
      'It\'d be great if users could close their own posts.',
    title: 'Allow users to mark their own posts as "Closed',
    votes: 21,
  },
  {
    created: '2016-06-15T19:09:34.244Z',
    details: 'Would be nice to have instant or hourly email notifications to help us be more responsive with our users.',
    title: 'Instant email notifications',
    votes: 19,
  },
  {
    created: '2016-08-03T23:29:18.588Z',
    details: 'Teams responding to posts are a great way to show users they\'re listening. Sometimes posts get lost and end up not being responded to. It would be great to have a section in the dashboard with unanswered posts ranked by number of upvotes.',
    title: 'Unanswered posts reminders',
    votes: 49,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-02-10T01:14:54.330Z',
    details: 'A native widget would feel a lot better than loading a web view. If we can do this with single sign-on, the experience would be super seamless.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'We\'d probably start with iOS  something like this:',
    title: 'Native Mobile Widget',
    votes: 81,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-06T10:39:31.283Z',
    details: 'Could use IP to deduplicate votes',
    title: 'Allow posting without registering',
    votes: 31,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-15T06:56:57.748Z',
    details: 'I can see many features which are worthless to this super product. Please, please do not follow every idea :(\n' +
      '\n' +
      'I want to down vote all those Nice to have ideas.',
    title: 'Downvote',
    votes: 32,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-20T00:12:52.784Z',
    details: 'Expose a single signed on user\'s notifications via API so they can be integrated into the parent\'s site.',
    title: 'Notifications integration',
    votes: 11,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-20T21:17:28.035Z',
    details: `To avoid people just up-voting because it's "cool" and resulting in non-essential features, allow for "types" of votes like: "I need this" or "I want this" or "This is cool`,
    title: 'Vote Types - Sentiment',
    votes: 33,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-21T02:16:55.725Z',
    details: 'As a board owner, I want to create  a board that either anonymizes end users such that they are not aware of each other, or allows an end user to anonymize themselves.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'This would function similar to the way that public google docs/sheets anonymize the viewers. "Anonymous Armadillo',
    title: 'Anonymized Boards',
    votes: 17,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-26T22:14:50.496Z',
    details: 'Change users\' email/name on their behalf, or use updated email/name from SSO token automatically',
    title: 'Ability to manage users',
    votes: 27,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-03-29T18:04:51.086Z',
    details: 'I constantly have to switch back to Admin View on my product. If I click the Canny logo to go back to my product\'s main page, it switches back to Public View. Also, clicking from an email notification switches to Public View. \n' +
      '\n' +
      'To be honest, I see no value in Public View, so it\'s a bit strange to me that it switches out of Admin View on my own product.',
    title: 'Default to Admin View',
    votes: 15,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-04-06T17:38:41.525Z',
    details: 'Limit the number of votes a user gets (say, 10-15 votes). As features are changed to Complete, give them those votes back to use on other features. I think this would really help surface the top features when people have to be more picky about the things they vote on.',
    title: 'Limit the Number of Votes Someone Gets',
    votes: 72,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-04-18T08:05:48.418Z',
    details: 'It would be nice to add support for markup so you could create **bold**, *italic* text, headings, * Lists and --- dividers. ',
    title: 'Possibility to use markup',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-05-05T23:46:51.785Z',
    details: 'Would love to be able to post a comment or a post with options/ideas, even screenshots of how we think about solving the feature request. Then for the people who want that feature can give more direct feedback on which version they might like and also have the ability to comment why they picked that option. \n' +
      '\n' +
      'Example: "Folders in lists" is a popular feature for us. But we have a few ways of thinking about folders for lists in WeDo. Would be great to ask our users in a simple poll, "Which design do you like the most, and why?" \n' +
      '\n' +
      'Yes, this can be done in comments and attaching photos. But the less steps it takes for someone to voice their feedback/opinion the more likely we\'d see it. If it could just be a one click vote, optional comment. Love that.',
    title: 'Polls',
    votes: 18,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-05-16T23:40:55.835Z',
    details: 'Similar to https://feedback.canny.io/feature-requests/p/being-able-to-vote-on-behalf-of-your-users, except for creating posts.',
    title: 'Be able to post on behalf of your users',
    votes: 68,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-05-27T17:39:53.747Z',
    details: 'It would be useful for keeping track of overall progress made on posts.',
    title: 'Post count for each status',
    votes: 11,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-06-02T21:23:22.712Z',
    details: 'So it plays nicely with a dark background.',
    title: 'Widget dark theme',
    votes: 35,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-06-23T18:09:45.204Z',
    details: 'I\'d love to be able to close voting/commenting on a post + maybe hide it from users to keep our list of posts cleaner.',
    title: 'A way to hide posts',
    votes: 11,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-07-18T21:05:14.338Z',
    details: 'Add ability to merge users that were created via the "Add Voter" form in Admin View.',
    title: 'Merge Users',
    votes: 14,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-07-31T07:06:37.543Z',
    details: 'We regularly have users replying to Canny\'s notification emails, which sends the reply email to you. While you guys have been great about forwarding these on, it would be better to either include our email as the Reply-To address in the notification email, or to have the reply added automatically to the post.',
    title: 'Reply to notification email to post',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-08-02T20:59:25.943Z',
    details: 'Currently, tags are only available for team admins. Users should be able see them as well.',
    title: 'Allow certain tags to be made public',
    votes: 117,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-09-18T06:45:59.371Z',
    details: 'A major issue often results in a lot of duplicate posts in a short time. Would be nice to have a banner that we can use to make major announcements / provide updates. Eg \'We are aware of issue X - a fix will be available in Y hours\'. Could potentially do this via sticky / pinned posts as well.',
    title: 'Banner for major announcements',
    votes: 17,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-09-22T01:09:34.616Z',
    details: 'Allow outgoing emails to be branded with company email domain vs canny.io.  Have SPF/DKIM settings for deliverability.',
    title: 'Custom email domain for outgoing emails',
    votes: 60,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-10-17T06:27:31.145Z',
    details: 'Receive email when a item I have created or voted on is commented on.',
    title: 'Email notification',
    votes: 12,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-11-11T22:48:26.392Z',
    details: 'Currently you can only search for terms in the original post, not in the comments. Would be great to have the option to search either or both, so that you can find important terms wherever they get posted.',
    title: 'Search for terms in both title and comments',
    votes: 51,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-11-14T07:33:54.765Z',
    details: 'Would be great if we could filter notifications by:\n' +
      '\n' +
      '-Post creations\n' +
      '-Mentions\n' +
      '-Comments\n' +
      '-Votes\n' +
      '\n' +
      'This is especially useful if:\n' +
      '\n' +
      '-Notifications volume is high\n' +
      '-There\'s more than one admin\n' +
      '-Each admin would like to isolate their own mentions first, to be able to prioritize follow-ups',
    title: 'Filter notifications',
    votes: 18,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-11-16T02:23:46.465Z',
    details: 'I know you guys offer a 14 day free trial, but a cheaper or free hobbyist tier with some QOL features cut would be great.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'I really like this project, but I can\'t justify spending $50 a month as a hobbyist.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'I suppose your target demographic is probably businesses, rather than individuals or small teams.',
    title: 'Early-stage startup discount, cheap plan, or free tier',
    votes: 16,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-12-03T06:35:56.226Z',
    details: 'We currently have 10 boards and each day we delete/merge different posts across these boards. When dug deeper, found that when creating a post, the current board is search and not all of them.',
    title: 'Global search all boards to avoid duplicates',
    votes: 70,
  },
  {
    created: '2017-12-11T18:20:02.814Z',
    details: 'If you\'ve set up feedback.yoursite.com, we should 301 redirect yoursite.canny.io there.',
    title: 'Redirect Canny subdomain to custom domain',
    votes: 51,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-07T21:54:56.060Z',
    details: 'Allow admin to define default visibility (public, unlisted, private) for new posts in a board. Also allow changing post visibility, so you can use it as a moderation feature.',
    title: 'Post visibility and moderation',
    votes: 18,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-10T02:52:00.242Z',
    details: 'This would be helpful for adding feature releases and batching multiple features together. For example, if a company has multiple products or high-level components that contain a variety features, related or otherwise.',
    title: 'Additional hierarchy layer, i.e. sub boards',
    votes: 19,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-15T20:01:57.845Z',
    details: 'Add the possibility to select only few boards on "Roadmap" screen.',
    title: 'Filter the roadmap by board/category/tag',
    votes: 65,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-16T22:06:22.541Z',
    details: 'I absolutely love the new Roadmap view, but my one critique is that I feel like it doesn\'t scale well when you have a lot of items. \n' +
      '\n' +
      'IMO, I feel like the design feels really squished, and the scrolling-within boxes feels  awkward. If the items line up with the bottom of the box, you might not even realize that it\'s scrollable. \n' +
      '\n' +
      'It\'s not entirely clear how many items are on each list (a total count would be great too!)\n' +
      '\n' +
      'It seems like it would work much better if all three lists just flowed naturally down the page rather than scrolling within their own boxes.',
    title: 'Make Roadmap scale better for lots of posts',
    votes: 20,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-24T05:20:48.164Z',
    details: 'Our users keep asking us for the same things over and over. What I usually do, I redirect them to the official Canny thread by sending them links. \n' +
      '\n' +
      'It would be cool as an admin If I can pin these questions in one board and use it as an FAQ on our website.',
    title: 'Pinned posts',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-01-25T19:55:01.890Z',
    details: 'Certain customers have mentioned issues with fake accounts / voters.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'Some ideas to prevent these issues:\n' +
      ' Add a toggle to disable sign up via email.\n' +
      ' If more than 1 non-oauth signup from the same IP is detected within 24 hours, make them fill out a captcha.',
    title: 'Prevent fake accounts',
    votes: 21,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-02-19T09:00:29.182Z',
    details: 'If a user views feedback.yoursite.com, there should be a link somewhere back to yoursite.com, so they can get back to the main application.',
    title: 'Link back to main website',
    votes: 27,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-03-05T20:31:12.896Z',
    details: 'I\'d like feature requests/bugs to be flagged that hit a certain threshold of similarity. Our users are doing a very light check for duplicates at best and it\'d be great to have some flagged for the admins to resolve.',
    title: 'Flag Similar Feature Requests',
    votes: 21,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-03-12T19:50:46.860Z',
    details: 'Sometimes I want to attach more than just an image to help my users see the issue. Sometimes a PDF with some larger details would be easier to show. Sometimes a video (see https://feedback.canny.io/feature-requests/p/video-attachments).\n' +
      '\n' +
      'Being able to do this would also allow the community to serve as a an ad-hoc support service.',
    title: 'Be able to attach other file types',
    votes: 40,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-03-26T13:16:33.716Z',
    details: 'I see there\'s another post on this for tags. It\'d be immensely helpful to have these for Categories given they\'re externally-facing. If not reordering, some way to sort either alphabetically or by # of posts within.',
    title: 'Reorder Categories',
    votes: 15,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-04-02T15:32:11.586Z',
    details: 'Give the ability to weight requests (say impact & effort, or customizable).  This will allow users to prioritize their list of requests.  Bonus points for displaying it on a matrix.',
    title: 'Ability for admins to weigh/prioritize requests',
    votes: 72,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-04-04T16:10:46.839Z',
    details: 'It would be great to be able to set the order in the roadmap column? \n' +
      '\n' +
      'I\'m fairly confident our users would assume there\'s an order of implementation implied by the order (and we\'d like to be able to do that).\n' +
      '\n' +
      'Would a drag and drop option be possible? Failing that shorting alphabetically so we can do a \'a) Feature X\', \'b. Feature Y\' type workaround?',
    title: 'Roadmap Ordering',
    votes: 41,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-04-13T12:47:52.549Z',
    details: 'It would be great if we could also embed the roadmap via a widget just like we can with the boards.',
    title: 'Roadmap widget',
    votes: 99,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-05-21T16:06:33.689Z',
    details: 'Let us customize the names of the statuses. Specifically I want to change "Under Review" to "Researching" or "Scoping".  "Under Review" sounds like the post is under review and might get deleted.',
    title: 'Custom Statuses',
    votes: 304,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-05-28T04:41:31.325Z',
    details: '',
    title: 'Remove "Powered by Canny',
    votes: 180,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-06-06T17:16:25.120Z',
    details: 'I would like to be able to edit or delete the merged comment',
    title: 'Edit/Delete Merged Comment',
    votes: 28,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-06-15T14:05:21.548Z',
    details: '',
    title: 'Export users',
    votes: 39,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-06-15T15:16:22.084Z',
    details: 'While scanning Canny, it\'s hard to tell which posts are linked to Jira and which aren\'t. It takes too much effort to click into every post to check.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'Showing whether the post is linked in the post list view makes this way easier.',
    title: 'Show whether a Canny post is linked to a Jira issue from the post list view',
    votes: 12,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-07-17T23:32:37.974Z',
    details: 'Add a privacy setting so that user comments can only be seen by the team, not other users.',
    title: 'Private Comments',
    votes: 26,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-07-23T15:52:51.041Z',
    details: 'I\'d like to share some public information for people viewing and using our board.  But, currently it looks like if the Public view is turned on then it displays full names and organizations from Intercom.  For confidentiality purposes I had to turn off public since it included full names and orgs.  It would be helpful to have an option to only publicly display first names.',
    title: 'Hide last names from public view',
    votes: 22,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-07-31T03:13:06.343Z',
    details: 'We would rather only use the voting ability and disable the ability for users to submit posts. Posts would be submitted by admins only.',
    title: 'Option to disable user submissions/new posts',
    votes: 25,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-13T18:05:26.154Z',
    details: 'In addition to a title and details field, allow admins to add additional custom fields. In another setting where we use Aha to collect feedback from customer-facing teams, we have custom fields to prompt specific questions like:\n' +
      '- how would this help solve a customer\'s problem? (text area)\n' +
      '- what is the relevant product area? (single select)\n' +
      '- steps to reproduce the bug?\n' +
      '\n' +
      'These Qs might be too much for a customer-facing feedback site, but they\'re super useful for discussing and sorting through ideas internally.',
    title: 'Customize the create post form',
    votes: 81,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-14T17:11:21.863Z',
    details: 'Instead of send updates via email, send them through the original conversation on Intercom',
    title: 'Send status updates back through Intercom',
    votes: 14,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-24T19:16:32.550Z',
    details: `When searching for a voter to add a vote on their behalf, we do a prefix search. This means "John" matches "John Smith", but "Smith" doesn't.`,
    title: 'Search for users/voters by last name',
    votes: 43,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-25T00:15:04.205Z',
    details: 'Allow customers to give us their Intercom app ID so we can so the messenger on their Canny site.',
    title: 'Show intercom on canny site',
    votes: 11,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-28T22:50:10.424Z',
    details: 'Send posts to an approval queue. Admins can decide if they want to make it public.',
    title: 'Approve posts before they go public',
    votes: 94,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-08-31T18:53:53.440Z',
    details: 'We\'d like to get more options than just changing the tint colour. Something like setting a solid colour across the top of the screen, or changing navigation menu colours, fonts, etc.',
    title: 'Allow more styling options (colours, font\'s, etc)',
    votes: 10,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-09-10T10:08:02.341Z',
    details: 'It would be great to be able to create your own roadmap view: I\'d like to define: \n' +
      '* the number of columns\n' +
      '* the title for each\n' +
      '* the status for each.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'This would be even more useful if you could create your own statuses as well.',
    title: 'Create your individual roadmap',
    votes: 15,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-09-25T05:15:22.403Z',
    details: 'Since our site is using React (and so is the Canny widget), it\'d be great to be able to import a Canny component directly from an npm package. This would simplify the integration and allow us to manage the imported JS/CSS the same as the rest of our site.\n' +
      '\n' +
      '(Happy to email a gist of our current integration if you\'re interested - a few workarounds to show progress while the widget loads)',
    title: 'Widget as React component',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-10-04T14:37:05.721Z',
    details: 'For example, monthly spend.',
    title: 'Add weight to votes based on customer attribute',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-11-16T16:13:15.434Z',
    details: 'Nice to have - ability to bulk edit posts e.g. change category, tags, statuses, change board etc.',
    title: 'Bulk edit',
    votes: 29,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-11-16T22:38:06.719Z',
    details: 'For people who add votes on behalf of their users but didn\'t initially add their email address. They should be able to add one after the fact.',
    title: 'Add/edit voter email',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-11-20T14:17:20.225Z',
    details: 'Have a configuration option to prevent upvotes after a feature has been concluded (closed or completed) or make the completed state more prominent.',
    title: 'Turn off ability to upvote for completed/closed feature requests',
    votes: 55,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-11-30T21:45:20.378Z',
    details: '',
    title: 'Ability to see categories in Intercom app selector',
    votes: 16,
  },
  {
    created: '2018-12-19T21:44:16.323Z',
    details: 'I\'m currently unable to tell if a bug that was voted for a lot a long time ago is still gaining a lot of votes. It\'s hard to keep track of what each submission\'s votes were last time. It would be useful if cards had a way to show me like a line graph of the votes for each day/week on the admin view.',
    title: 'Post analytics (vote acceleration, clicks/views)',
    votes: 14,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-02-26T17:32:03.520Z',
    details: 'Our users want to filter for ideas they submitted, not just voted on. They take a lot of pride in being the genesis for these ideas. This has a number of votes from our users.',
    title: 'Filter for Own Ideas in Addition to Votes',
    votes: 32,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-03-11T23:15:23.863Z',
    details: 'When I receive an email notification about \'Canny\' I get confused and think the request is about my product, the emails I get are quite similar.',
    title: 'Bigger distinction between emails about Canny and emails relating to my product',
    votes: 10,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-04-11T21:59:59.410Z',
    details: 'Could be time based (ex. 3 days, 1 month) or simply how difficult it is (ex. hard, easy). This will help set user expectations.',
    title: 'Signal for how easy/difficult something is',
    votes: 11,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-04-25T15:49:21.139Z',
    details: 'Sometimes a comment really refers to something separate. It\'d be nice if admins could upgrade a comment into a new post.',
    title: 'Upgrade a comment into a post',
    votes: 21,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-05-02T18:46:45.237Z',
    details: 'I would like to have a board template so I can use the same settings for sections like "Create Post Form", "Privacy", and "Tags" for all new boards.',
    title: 'Board Template',
    votes: 17,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-06-12T04:03:20.009Z',
    details: 'It would be great if you had a full page changelog widget rather than having to click a button to show a popover.',
    title: 'Full page changelog widget',
    votes: 26,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-06-26T06:51:46.462Z',
    details: 'Something people can opt into to receive emails about new product changes.',
    title: 'Email notification for new changelog entries',
    votes: 21,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-06-26T13:28:41.323Z',
    details: 'Allow people to chime in with feedback and praise on changelog entries.',
    title: 'Feedback/reactions on changelog entries',
    votes: 17,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-07-01T20:46:32.047Z',
    details: 'Would be awesome if we supported a messenger home app with the latest changes.',
    title: 'Changelog messenger home app for Intercom',
    votes: 23,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-07-01T20:47:30.318Z',
    details: 'Allow people to search for changelog entries',
    title: 'Changelog search',
    votes: 13,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-07-05T12:57:39.619Z',
    details: 'It would be really nice if you could link Feedback Items to a Changelog Entry. Sure, you could find the feedback, copy the URL, and add a link to it in the entry, but I\'m looking for something more convenient and two way.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'With my use case, you should be able to link multiple feedback items to a single entry. And the feedback item should have a link back to the entry as well.\n' +
      '\n' +
      'Here is what my basic release workflow is:\n' +
      '\n' +
      '1. When I\'m done with a feedback item, I mark it as complete (but it hasn\'t been released yet).\n' +
      '\n' +
      '2. Once I release the version with the feedback item, I create a changelog entry highlighting the important changes.',
    title: 'Show linked feedback items in public changelog entry',
    votes: 15,
  },
  {
    created: '2019-07-22T18:25:31.974Z',

    details: 'I have a few suggestions for how to improve the \'Stale posts\' feature.\n' +
      'Suggestion #1  When I have no stale posts it uses a lot of screen estate on the /admin view. I would rather just see my roadmap.\n' +
      'Suggestion #2  Update \'stale posts\' whenever a new comment or edit is made by an admin, not just on \'status\' change. That would make a lot of our features go out of \'stale\' mode when we can\'t change their status.\n' +
      'Suggestion #3  If suggestion #2 isn\'t an option, then make it possible to disable \'Stale posts\'.
